item.title: Serial killer 'confesses' to killing British student Joanna Parrish in France
item.author: news.france@thelocal.com
item.description: A French serial killer dubbed the Ogre of the Ardennes has confessed to the murder of British student Joanna Parrish in 1990, the victim’s family’s lawyer has said.
